title.narrative: ML-0000243 Dev new type region oriented educ

description.narrative:
The Lycée Professionnel is a public professional school, open to all students who have qualified for secondary technical education. Students will be mainly Dogon and Peul who inhabit the Dogon region.
When the Lycée Professionel starts in October 2016, there is a capacity of 150 students. When the school is completed in 2018 it may accommodate 400 to 600 students. They all may profit of the adapted curriculum, traineeships and the course in entrepreneurship.
As in the program ‘les mots Imprimés’ the teachers will become more motivated and enthusiastic by training and that will create a good atmosphere in the school. A good school can compete with the regular education in the city (Mopti, Bamako).
The inhabitants of the Dogon region may profit from an secondary education in Sangha. Families will not be split up and more experts on issues relevant for the region are available. Moreover, the intention is that experts will create businesses and will thus stimulate the local employment and economy.

Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

description.narrative: Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

title.narrative: % of all children reached that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship

description.narrative: Edukans wants children to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through quality basic and secondary education. With the educational background children are empowered to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all children reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.

title.narrative: % of all youth reached that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship

description.narrative: Edukans wants marginalised youth to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through vocational (technical) training and in some cases Life skills training. The training helps youngsters to be professional in obtaining and keeping a job or start their own business and to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all youth reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.
